title: By Katarina nerf o goddddd!
body:
Hi I talk directly to Riot not if you listen to or read not'm not someone from the future
From what I come to talk about is that basically is broken Katarina everyone knows but will give reasons

First: His ulti all know that this broken people who recently played and can be a penta with this champion all skills are easy to take because it is a very easy character to occupy

Second, it is very difficult to deal with an enemy Katarina especially when you exceed a single level and can not do nothing basically fedea

If not Riot read this, If you read is difficult but good is Riot
Greetings bros: v

replies.body: Por qué hiciste dos veces un post de esto en inglés y en español en LAS? :v
Why don't you go screw yourself? In spanish, please, there's a lot of people here who don't understand english, you dumb!
emmmm dado a que sos bronce 5 se nota que no sabes jugarle y por eso pedis nerf :/
Como estudiante de Inglés esto me hizo doler. Denunciado.
Te re pego el faso perro

Si sabias que este foro no lo ve nadie de NA o que solo hable ingles no?
Y que nadie va a nerfear a Katarina en el corto o mediano plazo?
Bueno, ahora lo sabes.
